title: Endings Guide
content:
rt still believes that she is meant to become the Lady Justiciar, and you will get the next choices here:

Kill her. Let's finish this ritual. [PERSUASION] Don't do it, Shadowheart. Don't kill her, you'll regret it. She knows something about you. Spare her, and see what she has to say. Say nothing.
